name: Quick Pickled Apple Matchsticks
description: I got my first CSA share of the season a week ago, and in addition to the other spring vegetables like snap peas and breakfast radishes, it came with an enormous head of red butter

publisher.name: Food in Jars
publisher.description: A blog about canning, pickling, and cooking from scratch.

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the apples into matchsticks and toss them with the vinegar, honey, salt, and pepper. Use immediately or stash them in a jar and put them in the fridge. They'll keep well for 2-3 weeks in the refrigerator.
